categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Vendetta was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer that served the Galactic Empire in the Inner Rim Territories during the Galactic Civil War. Lieutenant Ander Rendrake, who was secretly a spy for the Alliance to Restore the Republic, served aboard the Vendetta. During his time aboard the Vendetta, Rendrake managed to acquire a number of code cylinders and access codes, allowing him access to every part of the Star Destroyer.
